p: The local government in Wuhan has made many attempts to contain the virus. Firstly, they imposed a nationwide ban on wildlife trade in markets, restaurants and e-commerce platforms. Secondly, they closed the seafood and animal Market in Wuhan in order to collect environmental specimens and to perform environmental sanitation and disinfection. In addition, China's National Health Commission announced on January 23rd “the suspension of public transportation, with closure of airports, railway stations and highways in the city” to prevent further disease transmission [ 19].
